name: Chamberflame
description:
Action-roguelite shooter. Each run is different from the last, featuring randomly generated areas, items, weapons, and enemies. Embrace the chaos, upgrade your arsenal, conquer the burning inferno that is Chamberflame. Remember, death is just part of the journey.

-RAPID FIRE ACTION-

Features:

  • Fast-paced, roguelite action.
  • Randomly generated levels.
  • Build synergistic item/gun combos.
  • 4 Unique biomes, 18 enemies, and 4 challenging bosses to face.
  • Elite enemy types.
  • 38 items with unique benefits/drawbacks.
  • 23 Weapons, 7 different rarities, endless weapon variety.
*numbers subject to change.

-VARIABLE WEAPONS-



  • Every new weapon you find has variable stats. Higher rarity weapons increases the amount these stats can vary.

-COLLECTABLE ITEMS-



  • Power up your run with unique items. Some give you attributes, while others alter gameplay.
